title: A Jar For The Jarring
description: The poetry of French poet Candice Daquin. Daquin currently makes the USA her home, though she has lived in Canada, France and the UK for some years. Her background as a dancer and copywriter are combined into creative prose and poetry throughout her writing which flourished online for many years in poetry forums and as a poetry reviewer. This is her first paper book.
author: Candice Louisa Daquin
